name: Cheesy Tuna Casserole
ingredients: 16 ounce bag frozen French cut green beans
3 ounces fresh mushrooms, chopped, about 8 small

instructions.en: Cook the green beans as directed on the package; drain well.
Sauté the mushrooms, celery and onion in the butter until very soft and starting to brown a bit.
Add the broth; bring to a boil. Let the liquid reduce by half, then stir in the cream.
Bring back to a boil. Turn down the heat and cook until reduced and thickened, stirring frequently. Season to taste.
Stir the tuna and mushroom soup mixture into the green beans. Add salt and pepper, if needed.
Mix in the cheese; put into a 1 1/2 - 2 quart casserole.
Microwave or bake until hot and bubbly.

notes: Do not freeze this dish. You may use 4 ounces of cheese instead of 8 for a less cheesy version. Xanthan gum can be used optionally, likely to thicken the sauce if needed.
